properties.areaDesc: Huntington, IN; Wells, IN; Blackford, IN; Jay, IN; Wabash, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 12:29PM EST until January 13 at 8:30PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning has been extended for the following rivers...

Salamonie River below Warren affecting Blackford...Huntington...
Jay...Wabash and Wells Counties

.Recent heavy rain has resulted in a rapid rise on the river.
Additional runoff from the heavy rain may result in changes
in crest height and timing. Monitor for updates.

The Flood Warning has been extended for
The Salamonie River below Warren
* from this afternoon to Monday evening.
* At 12 PM Saturday the stage was 11.7 feet and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 12.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon
and crest near 12.6 feet around  7 AM Sunday January 12 before falling
below flood stage around 8 PM Sunday January 12.
* At 12.0 feet...The river reaches flood stage with minor flooding of
low agricultural land and roads nearest the river.
properties.instruction:
Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep
to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood
waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further
statements and updated forecasts.

Detailed river forecasts and more information can be found on the
internet at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.

All times are in Eastern Time. This statement will be updated in
about 24 hours or sooner if necessary.
